config.name: GENIE
config.param: 5.e13 pot per spill generated - will pick a poisson number of interactions for each spill
0 events per spill generated - will override POTPerSpill if non-zero if non-zero exactly EventsPerSpill events will be made for each spill
"NOvA-NDOS" name of detector see GNuMIFlux.xml from GENIE/src/FluxDrivers for list of allowed locations
"mono" is the flux coming from a histogram, ntuple or mono(energetic)?
"filename" name of file containing fluxes
"booster" is the beam the booster or numi?
"vDetEnclosure" top volume in which to generate events - look at geometry to determine volume names
2 energy for monoenergetic neutrinos if generating those
12 14 pdg code for which neutrinos to generate

GSPLOAD /grid/fermiapp/nova/novasrt/data/gxspl-NUMI-R2.6.0.xml GPROMODE YES GEVGL Default
environmental variables to set for GENIE- GSPLOAD is the spline file to load, GPROMODE YES tells the generator to turn off a bunch of stupid output GEVGL tells the generator what type of interaction to generate: all CC types is CC, all NC types is NC, others defined in $GENIE/config/EventGeneratorListAssembler.xml
12. A of the target nucleus - used in histogram flux mode, so the resulting values are approximations
0. mass of any material surrounding the detector - calculated assuming the same A as the detector, so you might want to compensate the mass up or down depending on the material in kg
0. ignore interactions that happen ZCutOff (in m) downstream of the end of the detector
3.0 radius of cylinder used for histogram and mono flux modes - in meters to make GENIE happy
0.0 0.0 0.0 location of beam center in xyz used for histogram and mono flux modes - in meters to make GENIE happy
0.0 0.0 1.0 direction of beam in dxyz used for histogram and mono flux modes
10000 Time (in nanoseconds) to add to all particle vertex times. "10000" implies that the beam spill will appear 10 microseconds into the readout window.
10000 Length of spill, in nanoseconds. A random time is drawn uniformly from 0 to RandomTimeOffset and added to all particle vertex times.
0 set the random number seed to use, if 0, let TRandom3 pick it, otherwise use the given seed
